#summary Returns a HTML select tag with months as options.
#labels method,view,date,form

You can use the `month_display` argument to control the display of the option tags. By default the full month names will be used but you can change to show abbreviations or just month numbers. 

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| month_display || no || string || names || pass in "names", "numbers" or "abbreviations" to control display ||

*Examples:*

{{{
#monthSelectTag()#
}}}

{{{
#monthSelectTag(month_display="abbreviations")#
}}}
